00048 TargetWriter::TargetWriter(  TargetCalculator* tc,
00049                              WeightCalculator* wc,
00050                              std::string target_base_name,
00051                              std::string weight_base_name )
00052   : targetCalc(tc), 
00053     weightCalc(wc), 
00054     targetName(target_base_name), 
00055     weightName(weight_base_name)
00056     {}
00057 
00058 TargetWriter::~TargetWriter() {}
00059 
00060 std::string TargetWriter::get_name() const
00061   { return "TargetWriter"; }
00062 
00063 double TargetWriter::loop_over_mesh( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00064                                      const Settings* settings,
00065                                      MsqError& err )
00066 {
00067   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00068   MeshDomain* domain = mesh_and_domain->get_domain();
00069  
00070   PatchData patch;
00071   patch.set_mesh( mesh );
00072   patch.set_domain( domain );
00073   if (settings)
00074     patch.attach_settings( settings );
00075   
00076   ElementPatches patch_set;
00077   patch_set.set_mesh( mesh );
00078   std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle> patches;
00079   std::vector<PatchSet::PatchHandle>::iterator p;
00080   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> patch_verts;
00081   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> patch_elems;
00082   
00083   patch_set.get_patch_handles( patches, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00084   
00085   std::vector< MsqMatrix<3,3> > targets3d;
00086   std::vector< MsqMatrix<3,2> > targets2dorient;
00087   std::vector< MsqMatrix<2,2> > targets2d;
00088   std::vector< double > weights;
00089   std::vector< Sample > samples;
00090   for (p = patches.begin(); p != patches.end(); ++p)
00091   {
00092     patch_verts.clear();
00093     patch_elems.clear();
00094     patch_set.get_patch( *p, patch_elems, patch_verts, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00095     patch.set_mesh_entities( patch_elems, patch_verts, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00096     assert(patch.num_elements() == 1);
00097     
00098     MsqMeshEntity& elem = patch.element_by_index(0);
00099     EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00100     patch.get_samples( 0, samples, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00101     if (samples.empty())
00102       continue;    
00103     
00104     if (targetCalc) {
00105       const unsigned dim = TopologyInfo::dimension(type);
00106       if (dim == 3) {
00107         targets3d.resize( samples.size() );
00108         for (unsigned i = 0; i < samples.size(); ++i) {
00109           targetCalc->get_3D_target( patch, 0, samples[i], targets3d[i], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00110 
00111           if (DBL_EPSILON > det(targets3d[i])) {
00112             MSQ_SETERR(err)("Inverted 3D target", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00113             return 0.0;
00114           }
00115         }
00116         
00117         TagHandle tag = get_target_tag( 3, samples.size(), mesh,  err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00118         mesh->tag_set_element_data( tag, 1, 
00119                                     patch.get_element_handles_array(), 
00120                                     arrptr(targets3d), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00121       }
00122       else if(targetCalc->have_surface_orient()) {
00123         targets2dorient.resize( samples.size() );
00124         for (unsigned i = 0; i < samples.size(); ++i) {
00125           targetCalc->get_surface_target( patch, 0, samples[i], targets2dorient[i], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00126 
00127           MsqMatrix<3,1> cross = targets2dorient[i].column(0) * targets2dorient[i].column(1);
00128           if (DBL_EPSILON > (cross%cross)) {
00129             MSQ_SETERR(err)("Degenerate 2D target", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00130             return 0.0;
00131           }
00132         }
00133         
00134         TagHandle tag = get_target_tag( 2, samples.size(), mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00135         mesh->tag_set_element_data( tag, 1, 
00136                                     patch.get_element_handles_array(), 
00137                                     arrptr(targets2dorient), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00138       }
00139       else {
00140         targets2d.resize( samples.size() );
00141         for (unsigned i = 0; i < samples.size(); ++i) {
00142           targetCalc->get_2D_target( patch, 0, samples[i], targets2d[i], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00143 
00144           if (DBL_EPSILON > det(targets2d[i])) {
00145             MSQ_SETERR(err)("Degenerate/Inverted 2D target", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00146             return 0.0;
00147           }
00148         }
00149         
00150         TagHandle tag = get_target_tag( 2, samples.size(), mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00151         mesh->tag_set_element_data( tag, 1, 
00152                                     patch.get_element_handles_array(), 
00153                                     arrptr(targets2d), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00154       }
00155     }
00156       
00157     if (weightCalc) {
00158       weights.resize( samples.size() );
00159       for (unsigned i = 0; i < samples.size(); ++i) {
00160         weights[i] = weightCalc->get_weight( patch, 0, samples[i], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00161       }
00162       TagHandle tag = get_weight_tag( samples.size(), mesh, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00163       mesh->tag_set_element_data( tag, 1, 
00164                                   patch.get_element_handles_array(),
00165                                   arrptr(weights), err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00166     }
00167   }
00168 
00169   return 0.0;
00170 }
00171 
00172 TagHandle TargetWriter::get_target_tag( unsigned dim, unsigned count, Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00173 {
00174   if (dim == 2 && !targetCalc->have_surface_orient())
00175     count *= 4;
00176   else
00177     count *= 3*dim; // num doubles
00178   if (targetTags.size() <= count)
00179     targetTags.resize( count+1, 0 );
00180   if (!targetTags[count]) {
00181     targetTags[count] = get_tag_handle( targetName, count, mesh, err );
00182     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00183       targetTags[count] = 0;
00184       return 0;
00185     }
00186   }
00187   return targetTags[count];
00188 }
00189 
00190 TagHandle TargetWriter::get_weight_tag( unsigned count, Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00191 {
00192   if (weightTags.size() <= count)
00193     weightTags.resize( count+1, 0 );
00194   if (!weightTags[count]) {
00195     weightTags[count] = get_tag_handle( weightName, count, mesh, err );
00196     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
00197       weightTags[count] = 0;
00198       return 0;
00199     }
00200   }
00201   return weightTags[count];
00202 }
00203 
00204 TagHandle TargetWriter::get_tag_handle( const std::string& base_name,
00205                                         unsigned num_dbl, Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00206 {
00207   std::ostringstream sstr;
00208   sstr << base_name << num_dbl;
00209   
00210   TagHandle handle = mesh->tag_get( sstr.str().c_str(), err );
00211   if (!MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00212   {
00213     std::string temp_name;
00214     Mesh::TagType temp_type;
00215     unsigned temp_length;
00216     mesh->tag_properties( handle, temp_name, temp_type, temp_length, err );
00217     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00218     
00219     if (temp_type != Mesh::DOUBLE || temp_length != num_dbl)
00220     {
00221       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS,
00222                       "Mismatched type or length for existing tag \"%s\"",
00223                        sstr.str().c_str() );
00224     }
00225   }
00226   else if (err.error_code() == MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND)
00227   {
00228     err.clear();
00229     handle = mesh->tag_create( sstr.str().c_str(), Mesh::DOUBLE, num_dbl, 0, err );
00230     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00231   }
00232   return handle;
00233 }

00236                                      const Settings* ,

00239 }
